audioText: Elle était fatiguée après ses devoirs, alors elle s'est couchée très tôt ce soir-là.
question: Why did she go to bed very early that night?
options: She was tired after her homework
She had an early class the next day
She wanted to wake up for breakfast
She was feeling sick from studying
explanation: The text states 'Elle était fatiguée après ses devoirs, alors elle s'est couchée très tôt ce soir-là' - She was tired after her homework, so she went to bed very early that night. 'Alors' means 'so/therefore' and introduces a logical consequence.
